title: Ada Nicodemou films dramatic Home and Away scenes with James Stewart
text:
She's had a lot of ups and downs over the last 20 years playing Leah Patterson-Baker on Channel Seven's long-running drama Home and Away.

And it appears they're not over yet for beloved actress Ada Nicodemou.

On Tuesday, the 42-year-old was spotted filming dramatic scenes in Sydney's Palm Beach with her on-screen boyfriend Justin Morgan, who is played by James Stewart.

Is everything okay? Ada Nicodemou (pictured) seemed to be having an intense conversation with James Stewart while filming dramatic Home and Away scenes in Sydney's Palm Beach

Relationship: Ada was first seen cheerfully walking over to her on-screen boyfriend James with two coffees before embracing him

After cheerfully walking over with two coffees, Ada embraced James before sitting alongside him on a boat trailer.

The loved-up pair seemed to be deep in conversation before the brunette beauty angrily storms off.

James is left stunned and appears to be calling his girlfriends name out but she fails to respond.

Happy: The loved-up pair seemed to be smiling and enjoying one another's company as they stared into each other's eyes

Taking a moment: Ada and James seem to be deep in conversation as they continued to talk while sitting on a boat trailer

What's happening? Ada and James than appear to start arguing and disagreeing

Ada was seen sporting a mustard coloured dress complete with a plunging neckline and matching belt while filming the scenes.

She accessorised her ensemble with a pair of nude heels and styled her brunette locks in a low bun.

James donned a pair of floral shorts, a blue t-shirt and a pair of flip flops.

Fighting: Ada than stands up and appears to question James who is stunned

Is it over? Ada storms off angrily leaving James sitting on the boat trailer alone

Ada made her first appearance on the long-running soap back in 2000.

Meanwhile, James joined the show in 2016.

Home and Away continues Monday at 7pm on Channel Seven.

Long service: Ada made her first appearance on the long-running soap as Leah Patterson in 2000. Meanwhile, James joined the long-running in 2016
